alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:04PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Morgan and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 403 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brushy Lake, or 9 miles south of Moulton, moving east at 10 mph. This thunderstorm is producing frequent lightning, if thunder roars, go indoors! HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Moulton, Trinity, Falkville, Hillsboro, Chalybeate Springs, Speake, Caddo and Basham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
